citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
The facility was contacted via phone and a voice mail was left at 10:57am about conducting an inspection. At 11:19am,
the facility returned the inspector's call and stated that a responsible adult representative would not be available to arrive
at the facility within the next hour to accompany the inspector during the inspection process on 06 JAN 22. .
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
The facility was contacted via phone and a voice mail was left at 10:57am about conducting an inspection. At 11:19am, 
the facility returned the inspector's call and stated that a responsible adult representative would not be available to arrive 
at the facility within the next hour to accompany the inspector during the inspection process on 06 JAN 22. . 
 
 
 
End Section
